SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class CLIView

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GameView
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.CLIView
public class CLIView extends GameView
The CLIView class represents the Command Line Interface view of the game. It interacts with the user through the console, displaying game information and reading user input.

      public CLIView()
      Constructs a new CLIView instance. Prompts the user for the server IP address and protocol type.
